```{r setup}
library(npmlangevin)
```

```{r}
class_string<- c("G", "3", "2", "1", "0", "A", "B")
loc_class_K<- data.frame(
  q = factor(
    c("G", "3", "2", "1", "0", "A", "B"),
    ordered = TRUE,
    levels = c("G", "3", "2", "1", "0", "A", "B")
  ),
  x = c(0.1, 1, 1.54, 3.72, 13.51, 23.9, 44.22),
  y = c(0.1, 1, 1.29, 2.55, 14.99, 22.0, 32.53)
)
loc_class_probs<- c(
  "G" = 0.026,
  "3" = 0.040,
  "2" = 0.035,
  "1" = 0.020,
  "0" = 0.065,
  "A" = 0.126,
  "B" = 0.688
)
```

```{r}
nt<- 100
nobs<- 40
gamma<- 5

obs_tau<- 1 * c(0.1, 0.1)
obs_cor<- 0.3


true_time<- sort(runif(nt))
true_loc<- matrix(0, nrow = nt, ncol = 2)

track_idx<- sort(sample(seq(nt), nobs, replace = TRUE))
loc_class<- sample(loc_class_K$q, nobs, replace = TRUE, prob = loc_class_probs)

loc_obs<- list(
  coords = matrix(0, nrow = nobs, ncol = 2),
  loc_class = as.numeric(loc_class) - 1,
  track_idx = track_idx - 1,
  K = as.matrix(loc_class_K[, c("x", "y")])
)
```

```{r}
obj<- MakeADFun(
  data = list(
    model = "random_walk",
    true_time = true_time,
    loc_obs = list(
      coords = matrix(0, nrow = nobs, ncol = 2),
      loc_class = as.numeric(loc_class) - 1,
      track_idx = track_idx - 1,
      K = as.matrix(loc_class_K[, c("x", "y")])
    )
  ),
  para = list(
    true_loc = true_loc,
    log_gamma = log(gamma),
    working_obs_cov_pars = c(
      log(obs_tau[[1]]),
      qlogis(0.5 + 0.5 * obs_cor) ,
      log(obs_tau[[2]])
    )
  ),
  random = "true_loc",
  DLL = "npmlangevin_TMB"
)
sim<- obj$simulate()


fitobj<- MakeADFun(
  data = list(
    model = "random_walk",
    true_time = true_time,
    loc_obs = list(
      coords = sim$sim_obs,
      loc_class = as.numeric(loc_class) - 1,
      track_idx = track_idx - 1,
      K = as.matrix(loc_class_K[, c("x", "y")])
    )
  ),
  para = list(
    true_loc = true_loc,
    log_gamma = log(gamma),
    working_obs_cov_pars = c(
      log(obs_tau[[1]]),
      qlogis(0.5 + 0.5 * obs_cor) ,
      log(obs_tau[[2]])
    )
  ),
  random = "true_loc",
  DLL = "npmlangevin_TMB"
)
opt<- nlminb(fitobj$par, fitobj$fn, fitobj$gr)
sdr<- sdreport(fitobj, opt$par)
sdr_est<- as.list(sdr, "Est")
sdr_se<- as.list(sdr, "Std.")
```

```{r, fig.height = 6, fig.width = 8}
obs_time<- true_time[track_idx]
obs<-  sim$sim_obs
loc_class<- loc_class
sim_true<- sim$true_loc

pred_true<- sdr_est$true_loc
lower_true<- pred_true - 1.96 * sdr_se$true_loc
upper_true<- pred_true + 1.96 * sdr_se$true_loc


par(
  mfrow = c(2, 1),
  mar = c(0, 1.5, 4, 0),
  oma = c(0, 0, 0, 5)
)
plot(
  x = true_time,
  y = sim_true[, 1],
  xlim = c(0, 1),
  ylim = c(
    floor(min(c(
      lower_true[, 1],
      sim_true[, 1],
      obs[, 1]
    ))),
    ceiling(max(c(
      upper_true[, 1],
      sim_true[, 1],
      obs[, 1]
    )))
  ),
  type = "l",
  xlab = "",
  ylab = "",
  xaxt = "n",
  yaxt = "n",
  col = "red"
)
lines(
  x = true_time,
  y = lower_true[, 1],
  col = "grey"
)
lines(
  x = true_time,
  y = pred_true[, 1],
)
lines(
  x = true_time,
  y = upper_true[, 1],
  col = "grey"
)
points(
  x = obs_time,
  y = obs[, 1],
  pch = 20,
  col = loc_class
)
mtext(
  "X coordinate",
  side = 2,
  line = 0.2
)


par(
  mar = c(4, 1.5, 1, 0)
)
plot(
  x = true_time,
  y = sim_true[, 2],
  xlim = c(0, 1),
  ylim = c(
    floor(min(c(
      lower_true[, 2],
      sim_true[, 2],
      obs[, 2]
    ))),
    ceiling(max(c(
      upper_true[, 2],
      sim_true[, 2],
      obs[, 2]
    )))
  ),
  type = "l",
  xlab = "",
  ylab = "",
  xaxt = "n",
  yaxt = "n",
  col = "red"
)
lines(
  x = true_time,
  y = lower_true[, 2],
  col = "grey"
)
lines(
  x = true_time,
  y = pred_true[, 2],
)
lines(
  x = true_time,
  y = upper_true[, 2],
  col = "grey"
)
points(
  x = obs_time,
  y = obs[, 2],
  pch = 20,
  col = loc_class
)
mtext(
 "Time",
  side = 1,
  line = 1
)
mtext(
  "Y coordinate",
  side = 2,
  line = 0.2
)


legend(
  "topright",
  xpd = NA,
  legend = levels(loc_class),
  col = seq_along(levels(loc_class)),
  pch = 20,
  title = "Loc. Class",
  inset = c(-0.15, -0.5),
  cex = 0.7
)
```
